scripts.prepare: yarn install && yarn workspaces foreach --all install && yarn workspaces focus --all && yarn workspaces foreach --all run prepare
scripts.local: docker compose -p l1vestack up --no-attach db-local --force-recreate --build frontend-local console-local docs-local db-local admin-local core-local
scripts.local:dev: docker compose -p l1vestack up --no-attach db-local --no-attach console-dev --force-recreate --build frontend-local console-dev docs-local db-local admin-dev
scripts.front: docker compose -p l1vestack up --force-recreate --build frontend-local docs-local db-local admin-local core-local
